OVER_MAX_WELL_VOLUME.title: Dispense volume will overflow a destination well

BELOW_PIPETTE_MINIMUM_VOLUME.title: Transfer volume is below pipette minimum ({{min}} uL)
BELOW_PIPETTE_MINIMUM_VOLUME.body: Pipettes cannot accurately handle volumes below their minimum.

BELOW_MIN_AIR_GAP_VOLUME.title: Air gap volume is below pipette minimum ({{min}} uL)
BELOW_MIN_AIR_GAP_VOLUME.body: Pipettes cannot accurately handle volumes below their minimum.

BELOW_MIN_DISPOSAL_VOLUME.title: Disposal volume is below recommended minimum ({{min}} uL)
BELOW_MIN_DISPOSAL_VOLUME.body: For accuracy in multi-dispense Transfers we recommend you use a disposal volume of at least the pipette's minimum. Read more

add_liquids_and_labware.title: Your labware has no liquids in it
add_liquids_and_labware.summary: In {{deck_setup_step}}, hover on labware to add liquids.
add_liquids_and_labware.step2: Watch liquids move as you build your protocol

deck_setup_explanation.title: Setting up your protocol
deck_setup_explanation.body1: If you look to your left you will see the Protocol Timeline, and that the "Starting Deck State" step is blue. The blue means that this is the step you are currently working on.
deck_setup_explanation.body2: Before you can build a protocol that tells the robot how to move liquid around, you'll need to tell the Protocol Designer where all of your labware is on the deck, and which liquids start in which wells. As you add steps to your protocol the Protocol Designer will move liquid from the starting positions you defined in the Starting Deck State to new positions.
deck_setup_explanation.body3: Hover on empty slots in the deck to add labware. Hover on labware to add liquid to the wells.

custom_labware_with_modules.title: Cannot verify compatibility of custom labware
custom_labware_with_modules.body: The Protocol Designer cannot confirm whether or not custom labware is compatible with any module. Proceed if you are confident your custom labware will fit.

module_without_labware.title: Missing labware
module_without_labware.body: Your module has no labware on it. We recommend you add labware before proceeding.

export_v6_protocol_6_20.title: Robot and app update may be required
export_v6_protocol_6_20.body1: This protocol can only run on app and robot server version
export_v6_protocol_6_20.body3: . Please ensure your OT-2 is updated to the correct version.

change_magnet_module_model.title: All existing engage heights will be cleared

thermocycler_lid_passive_cooling.title: Lid temperature
thermocycler_lid_passive_cooling.body1b: . When entering a temperature lower than the previous temperature, keep in mind the following:
thermocycler_lid_passive_cooling.li1: If the Thermocycler lid is closed it may take a very long time to reach a cooler temperature.
thermocycler_lid_passive_cooling.li2: If the room temperature in your lab is higher than the temperature you have defined, the lid will never reach it. This will stall your protocol indefinitely.

protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.title: Editing multiple steps
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.body1: Now that your protocol has multiple steps, you can try using Protocol Designer’s batch edit features.
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.li1b: to select a range of steps
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.li2b: to select a single additional step.
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.body3a: To delete or duplicate multiple steps:
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.body3b: Use the control bar at the top of the Protocol Timeline.
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.body4a: To batch edit Transfer or Mix advanced settings:
protocol_can_enter_batch_edit.body4b: Only include Transfer or Mix steps in your selection.

INSUFFICIENT_TIPS.title: Not enough tips to complete action
INSUFFICIENT_TIPS.body: Add another tip rack to an empty slot in

NO_TIP_ON_PIPETTE.title: No tip on pipette at the start of step
NO_TIP_ON_PIPETTE.body1: Choose a different Change Tip setting. Change Tip cannot be "Never" the first time a pipette is used in a protocol, or following a step that used the
NO_TIP_ON_PIPETTE.body2: . Pipetting steps must begin with a tip on.

MODULE_PIPETTE_COLLISION_DANGER.title: Pipette cannot access labware
MODULE_PIPETTE_COLLISION_DANGER.body: Gen 1 8-Channel pipettes cannot access labware or tip racks in slot 4 or 6 because they are adjacent to modules. Read more

MISSING_MODULE.title: Missing module for step
MISSING_MODULE.body: A step requires a module that does not exist

MISSING_TEMPERATURE_STEP.title: Missing Temperature step
MISSING_TEMPERATURE_STEP.body: Add a Temperature step prior to this Pause step. The module is not currently changing temperature because it has either been deactivated or is holding a temperature

THERMOCYCLER_LID_CLOSED.title: Thermocycler lid is closed
THERMOCYCLER_LID_CLOSED.body: Before the robot can interact with labware in the Thermocycler, the lid must be open. To resolve this error, please add a thermocycler step ahead of the current step, and set the lid status to "open".

HEATER_SHAKER_LATCH_OPEN.title: Heater-Shaker labware latch is open
HEATER_SHAKER_LATCH_OPEN.body: Before the robot can interact with labware on the Heater-Shaker module, the labware latch must be closed. To resolve this error, please add a Heater-Shaker step ahead of the current step, and set the labware latch status to "closed".

HEATER_SHAKER_IS_SHAKING.title: Heater-Shaker is shaking
HEATER_SHAKER_IS_SHAKING.body: the robot cannot interact with labware on the Heater-Shaker Module while it is shaking.

TALL_LABWARE_EAST_WEST_OF_HEATER_SHAKER.body: The Heater-Shaker labware latch will collide with labware over 53 mm. Move labware to a different slot.

HEATER_SHAKER_EAST_WEST_LATCH_OPEN.body: Pipettes cannot access labware on, or to the left or right of, the Heater-Shaker while the labware latch is open. Create a step before this one that closes the latch.

HEATER_SHAKER_NORTH_SOUTH_EAST_WEST_SHAK.title: The Heater-Shaker is shaking
HEATER_SHAKER_NORTH_SOUTH_EAST_WEST_SHAK.body: Pipettes cannot access labware on or adjacent to the Heater-Shaker while it is shaking. Create a step before this one that deactivates the shaker.

HEATER_SHAKER_EAST_WEST_MULTI_CHANNEL.title: 8-Channel pipette cannot access labware
HEATER_SHAKER_EAST_WEST_MULTI_CHANNEL.body: 8-Channel pipettes cannot access labware or tip racks to the left or right of a Heater-Shaker GEN1 module. Move labware to a different slot to access it with an 8-Channel pipette.

HEATER_SHAKER_NORTH_SOUTH__OF_NON_TIPRAC.title: 8-Channel pipette cannot access labware
HEATER_SHAKER_NORTH_SOUTH__OF_NON_TIPRAC.body: 8-Channel pipettes cannot access labware in front of or behind a Heater-Shaker. They can access Opentrons Tip Racks in this slot. Move labware to a different slot.

ASPIRATE_MORE_THAN_WELL_CONTENTS.title: Not enough liquid in well(s)
ASPIRATE_MORE_THAN_WELL_CONTENTS.body: You are trying to aspirate more than the current volume of one of your well(s)

ASPIRATE_FROM_PRISTINE_WELL.title: Source well is empty
ASPIRATE_FROM_PRISTINE_WELL.body: The well(s) you're trying to aspirate from are empty. To add liquids, hover over labware in

window.confirm_create_new: Are you sure you want to create a new file? Any unsaved changes will be discarded.
window.confirm_delete_step: Are you sure you want to delete this step?
window.confirm_import: Are you sure you want to import this file? You will lose any current unsaved changes.
window.confirm_leave: Are you sure you want to leave? You will lose any unsaved changes.

SLOT_OCCUPIED.title: Cannot place module
SLOT_OCCUPIED.body: Slot {{selectedSlot}} is occupied by another module or by labware incompatible with this module. Remove module or labware from the slot in order to continue.

HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_LABWARE_TOO_TALL.title: Cannot place module
HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_LABWARE_TOO_TALL.body: Slot {{selectedSlot}} is occupied by labware over 53mm tall. The Heater-Shaker's labware latch risks collision with this labware.

HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_TO_ANOTHER_MODULE.title: Cannot place module
HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_TO_ANOTHER_MODULE.body: Slot {{selectedSlot}} is occupied by a module. The Heater-Shaker cannot be placed in front of or behind another module.

HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_TO_MODULE.title: Cannot place module
HEATER_SHAKER_ADJACENT_TO_MODULE.body: Slot {{selectedSlot}} is occupied by a Heater-Shaker. Other modules cannot be placed in front of or behind a Heater-Shaker.

no_commands.heading: Your protocol has no steps
no_commands.body1: This protocol has no steps in it- there's nothing for the robot to do! Before trying to run this on your robot add at least one step between your Starting Deck State and Final Deck State.

unused_pipette_and_module.heading: Unused pipette and module
unused_pipette_and_module.body1: The {{pipettesDetails}} and {{modulesDetails}} in your protocol are not currently used in any step. In order to run this protocol you will need to attach this pipette as well as power up and connect the module to your robot.
unused_pipette_and_module.body2: If you don't intend to use them, please consider removing them from your protocol.

unused_pipette.heading: Unused pipette
unused_pipette.body1: The {{pipettesDetails}} specified in your protocol is currently not used in any step. In order to run this protocol you will need to attach this pipette to your robot.
unused_pipette.body2: If you don't intend to use the pipette, please consider removing it from your protocol.

unused_module.heading: Unused module
unused_module.body1: The {{modulesDetails}} specified in your protocol are not currently used in any step. In order to run this protocol you will need to power up and connect the module to your robot.
unused_module.body2: If you don't intend to use the module, please consider removing it from your protocol.

unused_modules.heading: Unused modules
unused_modules.body1: The {{modulesDetails}} specified in your protocol are not currently used in any step. In order to run this protocol you will need to power up and connect the modules to your robot.
unused_modules.body2: If you don't intend to use these modules, please consider removing them from your protocol.

unused_gripper.heading: Unused gripper
unused_gripper.body1: The Flex Gripper is specified in your protocol is not currently used in any step. In order to run this protocol you will need to connect it to your robot.
unused_gripper.body2: If you don't intend to use the Flex Gripper, please consider removing it from your protocol.

crash.pipettes_east_west: pipettes cannot access slots to the left or right of a
crash.labware_east_west: can be placed to the left or right of a
crash.pipettes_can_access_north_south: pipettes can only access slots in front of or behind a
crash.pipettes_cannot_access_north_south: pipettes cannot access slots in front of or behind a
crash.modules_north_south: No modules can be placed in front of or behind a
crash.slot_has_tiprack: if that slot contains a tip rack.
crash.latch_collision: due to risk of collision with the labware latch.
